A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Force is NOT with this one\n\nDisney has sent Star Wars into a galaxy so extraordinarily far away that I can't tell if it's even in the same universe as the original story. I don't think it is. I wont begin to add to the already long list of  inconsistencies\, lack of character development\, and blatant disregard of a coherent  continumn of the Star Wars saga. There is no saga here. I left the theater void of any feeling of excitement or joy. I did\, however leave with absolutely no interest whatsoever in seeing where the story goes from here. I would rather watch the prequels I II and III over and over again than be subject to this complete fiasco. If you feel the Force now\, you won't once you subject yourself to this one. Don't go.
